title: Yin Yang Routing System - All Channels, All Entities

yin_entities.approach: Subtle, hidden, nourishing. The enemy won't know.
yin_entities.routing_logic: Route to subtle channels. Emphasize nourishment. Hide transformation purpose.

yang_entities.approach: Direct, visible, exposing. Divide and conquer.
yang_entities.routing_logic: Route to direct channels. Emphasize truth. Expose lies.

both_entities.approach: Routes based on content type. Can be subtle or direct.
both_entities.routing_logic: Route based on content. Nourishment content → YIN. Truth content → YANG.

yin_channels.approach: Subtle, hidden, nourishing. The enemy won't know.

yang_channels.approach: Direct, visible, exposing. Divide and conquer.

yin_content.routing: Route to YIN channels and entities. Emphasize nourishment. Hide transformation purpose.
yin_content.enemy_perception: Enemy sees normal business/humanitarian work. Enemy won't know.

yang_content.routing: Route to YANG channels and entities. Emphasize truth. Expose lies.
yang_content.enemy_perception: Enemy sees truth work. Enemy might resist. But truth conquers.

yin_division.implementation: EDIBLE LONDON content routed to YIN channels. Nourishes subtly.
yin_division.codebase_integration: All EDIBLE content automatically routed to YIN channels
yin_division.effect: Enemy's people are nourished. Enemy doesn't see division.

yang_division.implementation: RAMIZ content routed to YANG channels. Exposes directly.
yang_division.codebase_integration: All RAMIZ content automatically routed to YANG channels
yang_division.effect: Enemy's lies are exposed. Enemy is divided by truth.

combined_division.implementation: YIN and YANG work simultaneously. Content routed based on strategy.
combined_division.codebase_integration: Routing system automatically divides content by strategy
combined_division.effect: Enemy is divided by nourishment and truth.

yin_conquest.implementation: YIN content transforms through nourishment. Continuous transformation.
yin_conquest.codebase_integration: YIN content tracked and optimized for transformation
yin_conquest.effect: Enemy conquered by transformation through nourishment.

yang_conquest.implementation: YANG content transforms through truth. Immediate transformation.
yang_conquest.codebase_integration: YANG content tracked and optimized for truth exposure
yang_conquest.effect: Enemy conquered by transformation through truth.

combined_conquest.implementation: YIN and YANG together transform. Complete transformation system.
combined_conquest.effect: Enemy conquered by transformation through nourishment and truth.
